tags.a: a{display: block; text-decoration: none; color: aliceblue;}

classes.title: .title{margin: 5px 0;}
classes.infoAfterHover: .info:hover::after{display: block; width: 100%; height: 1px; background-color: currentColor; margin-top: 2px;}
classes.personalInfoBlock: .name, .birth-date, .study, .languages, .about-myself{width: 50%; padding: 5px; border: 3px solid #EAEAEA; border-radius: 10px; margin: 15px auto; cursor: pointer; transition: background-color ease-in-out 0.3s, box-shadow ease-in-out 0.3s, color ease-in-out 0.3s}
